description: Pile your pancakes high and top with yoghurt and berries for a delicious, nutrionally approved breakfast. This recipe for fluffy pancakes is a must.
keywords: Pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Healthier Pancakes With Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Macro Organic frozen mixed berries
2 tsp Macro Organic rice malt syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Heat berries, syrup and 2 tbs water in a small saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until sugar has dissolved and mixture has thickened. Transfer to a bowl and stand for 30 minutes to cool.
Meanwhile, place bananas, eggs and oats in blender and blend for 10 seconds or until smooth. Set aside for 15 minutes to rest.

Spray a large frying pan with oil and heat over medium heat. Add 2 x 1/3 cups batter to pan and cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear. Flip and cook for 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining batter to make a total of 12 pancakes.
Serve pancakes topped with yoghurt and berry compote.
